PUNISH.kick.en-US:
[grey]You got [red]KICKED from the server!

[blue]Moderator: [executor]
[blue]Reason: [reason]
[blue]Punishment ID: [id]

If you think that this [red]Kick was a [blue]mistake or [blue]unfair,
feel free to create a [blue]Ticket on our Discord Server!

discord.danismp.net
PUNISH.kick.de-DE:
[grey]Du wurdest vom Server [red]GEKICKT!

[blue]Moderator: [executor]
[blue]Grund: [reason]
[blue]Punishment ID: [id]

Wenn du denkst, dass dieser [red]Kick ein [blue]Fehler oder [blue]unfair war,
kannst du gerne ein [blue]Ticket auf unserem Discord Server erstellen!

discord.danismp.net

PUNISH.ban.en-US:
[grey]You got [red]BANNED from the server!

[blue]Moderator: [executor]
[blue]Reason: [reason]
[blue]Duration: [duration] ([blue]German Time)
[blue]Servergroup: [servergroup]
[blue]Punishment ID: [id]

If you think that this [red]Ban is a [blue]mistake or [blue]unfair,
feel free to create a [blue]Ticket on our Discord Server!

discord.danismp.net

[prefix] [blue]Moderator: [executor]
[prefix] [blue]Grund: [reason]
[prefix] [blue]Dauer: [duration]
[prefix] [blue]Servergruppe: [servergroup]

PUNISH.command.general.error.reason.notf.en-US: [grey]The reason [blue][reason]</color> [red]does not exist</color> in the list of available reasons for punishments.</color>
PUNISH.command.general.error.reason.notf.de-DE: [grey]Der Grund [blue][reason]</color> [red]existiert nicht</color> in der Liste der verfügbaren Gründe für Bestrafungen.</color>

PUNISH.command.admin.wipe.en-US: [grey][green]Successfully</color> wiped all punishments for the player [blue][player]!</color></color>
PUNISH.command.admin.wipe.de-DE: [grey]Alle Bestrafungen für den Spieler [blue][player]</color> wurden [green]erfolgreich</color> gelöscht!</color>

PUNISH.command.kick.en-US: [grey][green]Successfully</color> kicked the player [blue][player]</color> from the server with reason [blue][reason]!</color></color>
PUNISH.command.kick.de-DE: [grey]Der Spieler [blue][player]</color> wurde [green]erfolgreich</color> mit dem Grund [blue][reason]</color> vom Server gekickt!</color>

PUNISH.command.mute.en-US: [grey][green]Successfully</color> muted the player [blue][player]</color> for [blue][duration]</color> and with reason [blue][reason]!</color></color>
PUNISH.command.mute.de-DE: [grey]Der Spieler [blue][player]</color> wurde [green]erfolgreich</color> für [blue][duration]</color> und mit dem Grund [blue][reason]</color> stummgeschaltet!</color>

PUNISH.command.ban.en-US: [grey][green]Successfully</color> banned the player [blue][player]</color> for [blue][duration]</color> and with reason [blue][reason]!</color></color>
PUNISH.command.ban.de-DE: [grey]Der Spieler [blue][player]</color> wurde [green]erfolgreich</color> für [blue][duration]</color> und mit dem Grund [blue][reason]</color> gebannt!</color>

ERROR.punish.already.punished.en-US: [grey]The player [blue][player]</color> does [red]already have</color> an active punishment of type [blue][type].</color></color>
ERROR.punish.already.punished.de-DE: [grey]Der Spieler [blue][player]</color> hat [red]bereits</color> eine aktive Bestrafung des Typs [blue][type].</color></color>

ERROR.punish.not.punished.en-US: [grey]The player [blue][player]</color> does [red]not have</color> an active punishment of type [blue][type].</color></color>
ERROR.punish.not.punished.de-DE: [grey]Der Spieler [blue][player]</color> hat [red]keine</color> aktive Bestrafung des Typs [blue][type].</color></color>

ERROR.duration.custom.permission.en-US: [grey]You [red]do not</color> have the permission to use [blue]custom durations</color> for punishments.</color>
ERROR.duration.custom.permission.de-DE: [grey]Du [red]hast nicht</color> die Berechtigung, [blue]benutzerdefinierte Dauern</color> für Bestrafungen zu verwenden.</color>

ERROR.reason.custom.permission.en-US: [grey]You [red]do not</color> have the permission to use [blue]custom reasons</color> for punishments.</color>
ERROR.reason.custom.permission.de-DE: [grey]Du [red]hast nicht</color> die Berechtigung, [blue]benutzerdefinierte Gründe</color> für Bestrafungen zu verwenden.</color>

ERROR.duration.perma.perms.en-US: [grey]You [red]do not</color> have the permission to use [blue]permanent durations</color> for punishments.</color>
ERROR.duration.perma.perms.de-DE: [grey]Du [red]hast nicht</color> die Berechtigung, [blue]permanente Dauern</color> für Bestrafungen zu verwenden.</color>
